# [Interview #810: Dark Matter Interview, Entry #28](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=810#28)

#### Nalini Haynes

Is there anything you’d like to say to fans?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Just thank you. Thank you very much for reading, and I hope you enjoy what’s comin’ atcha!

#### Nalini Haynes

Thank you for talking to
*Dark Matter*
.

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yeah. Thank you.
